SENT.plain: We report here a case of acute nonlymphocytic leukemia evolving from a myelodysplastic syndrome which developed in an elderly man who had received radiation therapy for a prior cancer
Cytogenetic analysis revealed the following karyotype: 47,XY, + 8,t(1;6)(p13;p23)
The breakpoints in the translocation are in the regions of the NRAS1 and PIM1 oncogenes on chromosomes 1 and 6, respectively
This translocation has not been previously observed in hematological malignancies
